description.english: As Mitsukuni, inflict a Status Effect on an enemy with a Weapon.
As Mitsukuni, equip a regular weapon, Ki Weapon, and Ammo Weapon simultaneously.
Make 200 Attacks with an Ammo Weapon across all playthroughs.
As Hidesato, have at least 3 Archers and/or Hunters in the party at one time.
As Hidesato, reach the Chubu Region without Hidesato taking any HP damage.
Use 500 XP Scrolls across all playthroughs.
As Shikibu, level up 20 Allies to Level 5 across all playthroughs.
As Shikibu, have Shikibu and 3 different types of Allies at Level 5.
Defeat the Karura.
As Kiyomori, acquire 20 Tier 2 or higher Allies across all playthroughs.
As Kiyomori, have a full party of all different types of Allies.
Kill 250 Humans across all playthroughs.
As Kajiwara, take exactly 1 Action per battle for 12 battles in one playthrough.
As Kajiwara, deliver the killing blow on 25 enemies in battles while Invisible in one playthrough.
Make 200 attacks with a Ki Weapon across all playthroughs.
As Minamoto, deliver the killing blow to all enemies in the same combat 25 times across all playthroughs.
Take 2 Attack Actions with Minamoto in the same Turn 50 times across all playthroughs.
Beat the game on Normal Difficulty.
Deliver 20 killing blows while Benkei is at 1 HP in one playthrough.
Deliver 100 killing blows with Benkei across all playthroughs.
Apply 200 Status Effects with any party member across all playthroughs.
As Lady Nijo, apply 100 Status Effects with a Weapon across all playthroughs.
As Lady Nijo, have any party member apply a Status Effect to a target already affected by 1 or more Status Effects 20 times in one playthrough.
Have a party member suffer multiple status effects at once.
Land a killing blow on an Armored Skeleton Archer with a Soldier.
Have two enemies die from Bleed on the same Turn.
Level Murasaki Shikibu to Level 5.
Win a Story battle related to Heian-kyo.
Hoard at least 600 Wado.
Win 4 Darkness Battles in Kanto or later regions in one playthrough.
Loot 5 Wado tokens in one combat.
Kill an enemy with the Fukiya.
Purchase 25 HP of healing from Shops in one playthrough.
Win a battle where the Leader does not use a Weapon.
Win a battle where the leader does not Move.
Kill a Bleeding target with a Farmer.
Kill the Nuppeppou without destroying his armor.
Win a battle against 2 Kijo in which no party member receives Bleed.
Cure an Ally afflicted by 2 or more Status Effects at once.
Purchase 20 Ammo from Shops in one playthrough.
Reach Kansai.
Reach Chugoku or Shikoku.
Win the Story battle in Chugoku or Shikoku.
Reach Kanto.
Hit 3 Enemies with a single Hankyu attack.
Overkill an enemy by 4 or more damage.
Attack 2 different enemies with a Katana in one Turn.

displayName.english: By the Power Vested in Me

description.english: Give the same party member an additional Move and Attack in the same Turn.
After the first Turn in combat, have a party member be Snared every turn.
Hit 6 different enemies with an Ammo Weapon in one combat.
Have a party member melee attacked 5 times in one turn.
Kill 2 enemies with a single yari attack twice in one battle.
Start and win a battle with only a Leader.
Win 15 Battles in one playthrough.
Purchase 50 Allies across all playthroughs.
Complete 25 Quests across all playthroughs.
Visit 50 POI Locations across all playthroughs.
Visit 50 Cities across all playthroughs.
Complete 25 timed battles across all playthroughs.
Hire or find 25 Farmers across all playthroughs.
Land 50 killing blows with Archers across all playthroughs.
Provide 50 additional Move turns with Poets across all playthroughs.
Cure 50 status Effects with Priests across all playthroughs.
Place 50 traps with Bandits across all playthroughs.
Kill 500 Enemies across all playthroughs.
Collect 1000 Wado with the Merchant across all playthroughs.
Spend 250 Ki across all playthroughs.
Attack with a normal weapon 500 times across all playthroughs.
Spend 250 Ammo across all playthroughs.
Spend 1000 XP scrolls across all playthroughs.
Repair 100 armor with the Artisan across all playthroughs.
Purchase 50 Weapons in Shops across all playthroughs.
Beat the game on Hard Difficulty.
Apply one of every Status Effect to an enemy with any party member in one playthrough.
Kill 2 enemies with a Yari in the same attack.
Apply Vulnerable to 25 enemies in one playthrough.
Take 200 Armor Damage on any party members across all playthroughs.
Restore 25 Armor to Tomoe Gozen in one playthrough.
Do not take an Action with Tomoe Gozen in 6 battles in one playthrough.
Restore 25 Armor to any party members in one playthrough.
Absorb 15 Damage with any party member in one playthrough with the Onusa.
Use the Court Musician's Absorb ability 25 times across all playthroughs.
Kill 2 enemies with one attack with a Spearman 10 times across all playthroughs.
Apply Vulnerable to 10 enemies across all playthroughs with a Pharmacist.
Use the Lietuenant's Heal ability 20 times across all playthroughs.
Apply Bleed to 10 enemies across all playthroughs with the Concubine.
Apply 100 Status Effects to enemies across all playthroughs.
